appDesc.message: 2FAS Pass is a next-gen password manager with no compromises in security and full control over your data.
appDesc.description: Description of the 2FAS Pass Browser Extension highlighting its features

autofillCommand.description: Label for the command used to trigger autofill

continue.description: Button label to proceed with an action

continue_without_pinning.description: Button label to proceed without pinning the extension

open_in_new_window.description: Option to open a link or page in a new browser window

go_to_settings.description: Button label to navigate to the settings page

fetch_from_mobile.description: Option to fetch data from the mobile app

go_to_home_page.description: Button label to navigate to the home page

cancel.description: Button label to cancel an action

edit.description: Button label to edit an item

domain_uri.description: Label for the domain or URI field

domain_uri_index.description: Label for a specific domain or URI with an index

username.description: Label for the username or email field

enter_on_mobile.message: I will enter it in my mobile app
enter_on_mobile.description: Option to enter data manually in the mobile app

autogenerate_on_mobile.message: Autogenerate password in my mobile app
autogenerate_on_mobile.description: Option to autogenerate a password in the mobile app

set_login_and_password_in_the_mobile_app.message: Set a username and password in the mobile app
set_login_and_password_in_the_mobile_app.description: Instruction to set login and password in the mobile app

reload.description: Button label to reload the page or data

update.description: Button label to update an item or data

danger_zone.description: Label for a section with potentially risky actions

try_again.description: Button label to retry an action

version.description: Label for displaying the version of the extension

back.description: Button label to navigate to the previous page or step

advanced.description: Label for advanced settings or options

light_mode.description: Option to enable light mode for the interface

dark_mode.description: Option to enable dark mode for the interface

unset_mode.description: Option to use the system's default mode for the interface

or.description: Text used to indicate an alternative option

unknown.description: Label for an unknown value or state

browser_internal_page.description: Label for a browser's internal page

close.description: Button label to close a window or dialog

notes.description: Label for a section or field to add notes

learn_more.description: Button label to access additional information

tier_0_name.description: Label for the highest security tier

tier_0_description.message: Do not share this password with the 2FAS Pass Browser Extension and type it manually.
tier_0_description.description: Description for the top-secret security tier

tier_1_name.description: Label for the second-highest security tier

tier_1_description.message: Share the password with the 2FAS Pass Browser Extension once after confirmation in the 2FAS Pass mobile app.
tier_1_description.description: Explains the ultra-secure tier where passwords are shared after mobile app confirmation

tier_2_name.description: Label for the standard security tier

tier_2_description.message: Access this password directly from the 2FAS Pass Browser Extension.
tier_2_description.description: Explains the secure tier where passwords are accessed directly from the extension

no_item_name.description: Label for a state where no item name is available

no_valid_domain.message: No valid domain detected. If it is a non-standard domain, add the appropriate protocol (e.g. https) at the beginning.
no_valid_domain.description: Label for a state where no valid domain is provided

sync_title.message: Sync with your 2FAS Pass mobile app
sync_title.description: Title for the sync data section

credit_card.description: Label for the credit card functionality

secure_note.description: Label for the secure note functionality

secure_note_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the secure note input field

secure_note_title.description: Placeholder text for the secure note title input field

secure_note_title_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the secure note title input field

secure_note_title_required.description: Validation message indicating that the secure note title is required

secure_note_title_max_length.message: Secure Note title must be less than 256 characters.
secure_note_title_max_length.description: Validation message indicating that the secure note title exceeds the maximum length

ssh_key.description: Label for the SSH key functionality
